title: New Jersey Democrats have their nominee in contentious governor's race
shortDescription: Rep. Mikie Sherrill will face Republican's Trump-backed candidate Jack Ciattarelli in November.

title: Trump-backed Republican wins New Jersey governor primary
shortDescription: Ciattarelli has run for New Jersey governor twice before, and in 2021, he came within three points of unseating current Gov. Phil Murphy.

title: Trump deployed troops to LA. Was it an overreaction?
shortDescription: President Trump has deployed thousands of troops to the nation's second-largest city. Are they really necessary?

title: 'Political props': Trump's use of the military draws concerns
shortDescription: Trump's effort to use the military to quell protests received pushback for his staff during his first administration. Now he's trying again.

title: Trump visits Fort Bragg for Army celebration
shortDescription: President Donald Trump visited Fort Bragg, formerly Fort Liberty, to celebrate the Army’s 250th birthday, honoring the military’s history and legacy.

title: Trump restores Confederate military base names
shortDescription: While at Fort Bragg, President Donald Trump said the Pentagon would restore the names of other military installations.

title: Trump, Newsom each find support and face risks in immigration debate
shortDescription: Trump and Newsom each found political support for their showdown over immigration enforcement, but experts see risks for each.

title: RFK Jr. fired members of key vaccine committee ACIP. What is that?
shortDescription: A fired committee member who served on the panel since July 2024 said the decision to fire him and his colleagues was "out of the blue."

title: Trump wants 20,000 National Guardsmen to hunt, transport immigrants
shortDescription: The moves would shift the military from its mission of defending the nation against foreign adversaries toward policing its streets.

title: LA mayor urges Trump to stop ICE raids
shortDescription: Los Angeles Mayor Karen Bass is asking the Trump admin to stop immigration raids in order to curb responses from protesters.

title: Trump's travel ban is here: What to know as US shuts the door
shortDescription: Trump's extensive effort to keep foreign nationals from certain countries out includes the halting of refugee admissions and a travel ban.

title: Trump at Fort Bragg. The base has been renamed 2 times in 2 years
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is visiting Fort Bragg ahead of the Army birthday celebration. The biggest U.S. army installation was once called Fort Liberty.

title: Trump: Protesters on Army's birthday will be met with 'heavy force'
shortDescription: Nationwide "No Kings" protests against Trump are scheduled for June 14 but not in D.C., site of a 250th birthday celebration for the U.S. Army.

title: Trump warns protesters ahead of military parade
shortDescription: President Donald Trump warned people against protesting in Washington, D.C., to celebrate the U.S. Army's 250th anniversary.

title: Trump on invoking Insurrection Act
shortDescription: President Donald Trump considered invoking the Insurrection Act amid troop deployment to L.A. following ICE raid protests.

title: 'We'll see': Trump weighs invoking Insurrection Act for LA protests
shortDescription: Trump deployed National Guard troops and Marines to L.A. in response to protests. The Insurrection Act would allow him to use troops more broadly.

title: Newsom should be 'tarred and feathered,' Mike Johnson says
shortDescription: House Speaker Mike Johnson said California Gov. Gavin Newsom is keeping the Trump administration from implementing federal immigration law
